languages_h.help1Txt1: Multiple languages can be installed in the Axis product. All web pages including the online help will be displayed in the selected language.
languages_h.help1Txt2: To switch to another language, a language file must first be selected.
languages_h.help1Txt3: This is done either by uploading a new language file or, in products that are supplied with multiple languages preloaded, by checking the relevant radio button.
languages_h.help1Txt4: This is done by uploading a new language file.
languages_h.help1Txt5: To upload a new language file, click the Browse button and locate the file. Then click the Upload Language button.
languages_h.help1Txt6: The new language can now be selected from the list of available languages. Click Save to implement the change.
